entry.title: 关系和有向图 Relations and Digraphs
entry.content:
• 笛卡尔积 (product set/Cartesian product)
    • $A \times B = \left\lbrace(a,b)|a\in A\ and \ b \in B\right\rbrace$
  • 划分 (partiton/quotient set)
  • 关系 (relation)
    • A relation $R$ from $A$ to $B$ is a subset of $A\times B$.
    • If $R\subset A\times B$ and $(a,b)\in R$, we say that $a$ is related to $b$ by $R$, and we also write $a\ R\ b$.
    • $R\subset A\times A$ is a relation on $A$.
